Not that Doris isn't open minded, however - after seeing an erotic movie with her husband, the couple ends up going with a lovely young woman and engaging in a torrid threeway affair. But this erotic interlude leaves Doris with a bad taste, and she gives Roland the perfect opportunity to bring home all the girls he's ever wanted; and Doris gets a chance to live it up with Didier and his best friend.
title: Hot Bodies
